periodic_table.description_ru: Determining the position of an element in the periodic table: period, group, subgroup. Metals and nonmetals. Atomic number and its relation to atomic structure.

electron_config.description_ru: Writing electron configuration of atoms, understanding subshells, Klechkovsky’s rule, Hund’s rule. Exceptions (Cr, Cu and others).

property_trends.description_ru: Patterns in atomic radius, ionization energy, electronegativity changes across periods and groups.

substance_classes.description_ru: Classifying substances into oxides, acids, bases, salts. Determining class and subclass by formula. Knowing key representatives.

nomenclature_logic.description_ru: Naming substances by formula and determining formula by name. Systematic and trivial naming rules.

amphoterism_logic.description_ru: Understanding amphoteric oxides and hydroxides: reactions with both acids and bases. Key amphoteric elements (Al, Zn, Be, Fe³⁺, Cr³⁺).

bond_types.description_ru: Determining bond type by formula: ionic, covalent polar/nonpolar, metallic. Relationship between bond type and substance properties.

crystal_structures.description_ru: Relationship between crystal lattice type (ionic, atomic, molecular, metallic) and physical properties: melting point, hardness, conductivity.

oxidation_states.description_ru: Determining oxidation states of elements in compounds. Rules for calculating and using oxidation states.

reactions_exchange.description_ru: Understanding conditions for exchange reactions: precipitate, gas, or weak electrolyte formation. Using the solubility table.

reactions_substitution.description_ru: Predicting displacement reactions using the activity series: metal displaces metal, hydrogen displacement from acids.

reactions_types.description_ru: Classifying reactions: combination, decomposition, exchange, substitution. Distinguishing features and examples.

redox_basics.description_ru: Identifying oxidation and reduction processes. Writing electron balance equations. Determining oxidizer and reducer.

qualitative_reactions_knowledge.description_ru: Recognizing ions and gases by characteristic features: precipitate color, gas release, color change.

genetic_chains_logic.description_ru: Converting between substance classes: metal → basic oxide → base → salt. Nonmetal → acidic oxide → acid → salt.

reaction_energy_profile.description_ru: Factors affecting reaction rate: temperature, concentration, surface area, catalyst. Exo- and endothermic reactions. Le Chatelier’s principle.

catalyst_knowledge.description_ru: Understanding how catalysts work: lowering activation energy, not changing equilibrium. Common catalysts and their applications.

calculations_basic.description_ru: Calculating molar mass, amount of substance, mass fraction of an element. Converting between mass, moles, and volume.

calculations_solutions.description_ru: Calculating mass fraction of dissolved substance. Mixing and dilution problems. Solute mass and solution mass relationships.

reaction_yield_logic.description_ru: Calculating theoretical and practical product yield. Stoichiometric calculations using balanced equations.
